verses.verse: And <S%G2504>I,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> when I <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2596>with<s%> <S%G5247>excellency<s%> of <S%G3056>speech<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G4678>wisdom,<s%> <S%G2605>declaring<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3142>testimony<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3056>speech<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2782>preaching<s%> was <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G3981>enticing<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> of <S%G442>man's<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G585>demonstration<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of power: <S%G1411><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> should <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5600>stand<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Howbeit <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> them that are <S%G5046>perfect:<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G165>world,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G758>princes<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G165>world,<s%> that come to naught: <S%G2673><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> we <S%G2980>speak<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G3466>mystery,<s%> even <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G613>hidden<s%> wisdom, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4309>ordained<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G165>world<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> glory: <S%G1391><s%>

Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G758>princes<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G165>world<s%> <S%G1097>knew:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> had <S%G1487>they<s%> <S%G1097>known<s%> it, they would <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G302>have<s%> <S%G4717>crucified<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

But <S%G235><s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3788>Eye<s%> hath <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1492>seen,<s%> <S%G3756>nor<s%> <S%G3775>ear<s%> <S%G191>heard,<s%> <S%G2532>neither<s%> <S%G3756><s%> have <S%G305>entered<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> the <S%G2588>heart<s%> of <S%G444>man,<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G2090>prepared<s%> for them that <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G601>revealed<s%> them unto <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2045>searcheth<s%> all <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G2532>yea,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> deep <S%G899>things<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1492>knoweth<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> of a <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G1508>save<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him?<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1492>knoweth<s%> no <S%G3762>man,<s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> have <S%G2983>received,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we might <S%G1492>know<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> that are freely <S%G5483>given<s%> to <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Which <S%G3739>things<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> we <S%G2980>speak,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3056>words<s%> which <S%G442>man's<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G1318>teacheth,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>which<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G1318>teacheth;<s%> <S%G4793>comparing<s%> spiritual <S%G4152>things<s%> with <S%G4152>spiritual.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G5591>natural<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1209>receiveth<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G3472>foolishness<s%> unto <S%G846>him:<s%> <S%G2532>neither<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> he <S%G1097>know<s%> them, <S%G3754>because<s%> they are <S%G4153>spiritually<s%> <S%G350>discerned.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> he that is <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G350>judgeth<s%> all <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> himself is <S%G350>judged<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> no <S%G3762>man.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> hath <S%G1097>known<s%> the <S%G3563>mind<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> he may <S%G4822>instruct<s%> <S%G846>him?<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G3563>mind<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
